name: Buzzobeast
description:
Buzzobae was listening to some sick beats, but they've turned her into Buzzobeast! Smash the city in time with the music and get a high score.

By @mirrorframe, @auroraboros, and @anadayloft for #lovejam2022

Controls

Controls are programmed by scancodes relative to a US Qwerty keyboard.

D - Smash left hand outer lane
F - Smash left hand inner lane
J - Smash right hand inner lane
K - Smash right hand outer lane
Space - Start game or pause

Creator High Scores

Can you beat us?  Good luck!

@mirrorframe: 3898
@auroraboros: 4284
@anadayloft: 4161

Tip: It is better to resort to button mashing than to let buildings survive!
